text: un ke nabi ne unhe phir kaha ke us ki badshaahi ki zaaheri nishaani ye hai ke tumhaare paas wo sandooq aa jayega jis mein tumhaare rab ki taraf se dil-jamyee69 hai aur aala Mosa aur aala Haroon ka baqiya tarka hai, farishte ose utha kar layenge, yaqinan ye to tumhaare liye kholi daleel hai agar tum imaan waale ho
